name: Space.io (flexgamesteam)
description:
Blast your way through space in this action packed minimalist shooter!

Please note: Game is very simple and offers some hours of decent content. Game is ready for launch but will try to add newer features in the future. 

Key features:

-Blast enemy ships and asteriods

-Few hours of enjoyment

-Cheapest price possible for a minimalist platformer game

-Sleek, responsive design 

-New features hopefully to be added in the future

For any issues please contact flexgamesteam@gmail.com.

We will be happy to assist you. 

If you would like to get it on another platform, check us out the game on Humble Bundle:

https://www.humblebundle.com/g/spaceio/
